title: Ticket #1317: oddities in performance testing.
description:
During some test runs on the schedd RH-testers found: 
ltrace -p <pid> -c
% time     seconds  usecs/call     calls      function
------ ----------- ----------- --------- --------------------
82.58   12.873469          36    353151 tolower
16.10    2.510296          69     36353 strcasecmp
0.33    0.051616          14      3638 free
0.19    0.030199          14      2112 strdup

when traversing the code you find instances where the strings are converted to lower case prior to a comparison, where strcasecmp could be used.
remarks: will re-eval during next round of performance testing.
creator: tstclair
